    level="1"
    right="Item 10"

>
[Fire-Jump Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3433)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=604" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 310 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 940 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black, metal ring is inset with rubies that occasionally give off wisps of smoke. It grants you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks.

**Activate—Fire Jump** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2229), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=710)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You Stride (or Burrow or Fly, if you have the corresponding Speed) into any fire large enough to contain you, including magical fires. You vanish into the fire and take no damage from it. You can sense all sufficiently large fires within 100 feet of where you vanish, and you reemerge from any of those fires, either within the fire or adjacent to it. If you end your movement in the fire, it affects you as normal.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
